alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:17PM CDT until September 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DESOTO...EAST CENTRAL TUNICA...TATE AND NORTHWESTERN PANOLA COUNTIES... At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coldwater, or near Senatobia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Senatobia, Coldwater, Como, Arkabutla, Phillipp, Strayhorn, Little Texas, Independence, Barr, Looxahoma, Dooley, Buxton, Savage, Crossroad, McGhee, Longtown, Prichard, Sarah, Poagville and New Town. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
